name: row:click
description: Fires the `row:click` and `record:click` event when a click occurs on a record (row).

returns.description: The cell event details.
returns.name: ZGData.cell

returns.description: The full data object for the row.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: ZGData.recordIndex

returns.description: The current row index.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

name: row:frozen
description: Fires when the frozen row state changes

returns.description: An array of rows frozen in the modified area (top/bottom)
returns.name: ZGData.frozenRows

returns.description: The area the frozen state was changed (top or bottom)
returns.name: ZGData.area

returns.description: The count of rows frozen in the  modified area.
returns.name: ZGData.currentFrozenRows

name: row:mouseout
description: Fires the event when mouse is moved out a record (row).

returns.description: The cell event details.
returns.name: ZGData.cell

returns.description: The full data object for the row.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: ZGData.recordIndex

returns.description: The current row index.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

name: row:mouseover
description: Fires the event when mouse is moved over a record (row).

returns.description: The cell event details.
returns.name: ZGData.cell

returns.description: The full data object for the row.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: ZGData.recordIndex

returns.description: The current row index.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

name: row:select
description: Fires when the row selector changes

returns.description: An array of currently selected rows
returns.name: ZGData.selectedRows

returns.description: The full data object for the row selected/unselected.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row selected/unselected, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: ZGData.recordIndex

returns.description: The current row index of the selected/unselected row.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

returns.description: Boolean indicating if the current row was checked or unchecked
returns.name: ZGData.checked
